item.title: Kinton
item.description: Kinton is one of my side projects, which is a online menu app and it helps customers oder reman online. GitHub Tech Stack Kotlin (language) MVVM (architecture), liveData, bottom navigation KOIN (dependency injection) Firebase authentication Moshi (JSON) Zxing (QR code) App Previews
